description:
You’ve conquered the world of Bang-On Balls: Chronicles, but do you have what it takes to survive as an unpaid intern in a cutthroat industry? Doesn’t really matter if you answered yes or no, because you are gonna need the Bang-On Balls: Chronicles Survival Guide anyway!

The Bang-On Balls: Chronicles Survival Guide is a digital artbook that gives you an exclusive behind-the-scenes look at the insights of Bang-On Balls: Chronicles.

You’ll follow the adventures of a new intern who joins Bang-On Studios and has to deal with crazy deadlines, demanding bosses, eccentric coworkers, and of course, balls.
For all the art lovers - the Survival Guide is filled with concept art and drawings, so there’s something for everyone to enjoy!
name: The Bang-On Balls: Chronicles Survival Guide
